## Hello

World

```{r circulo}
area <- function(r) {
  return (pi*r^2)
}
```

```{r cuadrado}
area <- function(l) {
  return (l^2)
}
```

```{r triangulo}
area <- function(b,a) {
  return (b*a/2)
}
```

```{r rectangulo}
area <- function(m,n) {
  return (m*n)
}
```

```{r trapecio}
area <- function(b,B,H) {
  return ((b+B)/2*H)
}
```
